INSERT INTO logistics_center_area (logistics_center_code, province_code, province_name, city_code, city_name, enable, del_flag, create_time,create_by, update_time, update_by) VALUES
( #{t.logisticsCenterCode}, #{t.provinceCode}, #{t.provinceName}, #{t.cityCode}, #{t.cityName}, #{t.enable}, #{t.delFlag}, #{t.createTime}, #{t.createBy}, #{t.updateTime}, #{t.updateBy} )

update.foreach:
update logistics_center_area
logistics_center_code = #{t.logisticsCenterCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province_code = #{t.provinceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province_name = #{t.provinceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city_code = #{t.cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city_name = #{t.cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update_by = #{t.updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{t.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update logistics_center_area set logistics_center_code = #{logisticsCenterCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province_code = #{provinceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province_name = #{provinceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city_code = #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city_name = #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enable = #{enable,jdbcType=TINYINT}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from logistics_center_area where logistics_center_code = #{logisticsCenterCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} And enable=1
